collection_summary.title: Self-Management: Reframe
collection_summary.learning_objective:
How do I change my self-limiting beliefs?

We all have the power to change the way we think. If we have self-limiting beliefs, we need to change them to positive beliefs. This process takes practice.

Now that you have learned to identify your self-limiting beliefs, in this activity, you will learn toÂ change your self-limiting beliefs.
